title: EAlarmType (Enum)
text:
TYPE EAlarmType :
This enumeration is used to distinguish between alarms and events.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: Undefined
rows.Comment: Undefined, resp. represents the absence of a value

rows.Name: Event
rows.Comment:
An event, that must be acknowledged by the user (has
acknoledge method ACK)

rows.Name: ImplicitlyAcknowledgedEvent
rows.Comment:
An event with acknowledge method REP, that is implicitly acknowledged and
only written into the alarm storage (not visible in the list of active alarms).

rows.Name: AlarmAPI
rows.Comment: An alarm that can only be raised programmatically
